lead_paragraph: Sister Irene Stefani arrived in Kenya in 1915, where she served as a Red Cross nurse and treated East African soldiers wounded during World War I.

headline.main: Kenya: Thousands Attend Italian Nun’s Beatification
headline.print_headline: Kenya: Thousands Attend Italian Nun’s Beatification

snippet: Sister Irene Stefani arrived in Kenya in 1915, where she served as a Red Cross nurse and treated East African soldiers wounded during World War I.
